attributes.action: Allow the Energy rebate to be vaulentery, and not compulsory.
attributes.additional_details: I want them to make it a voluntary payment that if people want it they can claim it when they wish to do it.
attributes.background: The £200 Energy rebate is a disgrace. There is no choice if you want it or not. People should have this choice to choose if they want to claim  it or not

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608007
